column5: I got the word that my week at Peffley's Camp on Wabaskang Lake is not going to happen this year, the camp will not open for May and June. My deposit will be rolled over to 2022. July is doubtful as the rest of the year. Got a friend that has a cabin near Virginia Minn. he has invited me up for some fishing in the area. The cabin is not on a lake but many within a hour. Will have to do some research on fishing in the area.
bummer! Sounds like a nice plan B!!
plan B has been activated. Back to Rainy lake for us this June. fished it last fall it was meh. Hope early June is better!
Iâ€™ve fishing Rainy in June, July and September. The trips in early June were easily the best.
Plan B for fishing this year as well. Just had my June trip cancelled to Quebec. Holding out a slim bit of hope for Sep hunting.
She will be a go sept keep the faith
We cant fish the Canadian side of Rainy like we normally do, so we are going to try the Minnesota side and operate out of Houseboat.
Rainy lake houseboats? We stay at the thunderbird right in the same bay.
No...We are using Northernaire Houseboats a little further East than the Thunderbird.
